title: WK-IT
specializes: Nextcloud gehostet in Eichenzell / Hessen. Von Einzelaccounts bis hin zu eigenen Instanzen mit garantierter exklusiver Bandbreite und Ressourcen.

title: HKN GmbH
specializes: We are a specialist for fully managed Nextcloud-Servers hosted in Germany with german privacy protection.

title: Hostiso
specializes: Hostiso is all in one solution for your Nextcloud, from free to Enterprise offering, with included free support for NextCloud, setup, install!

title: OwnCube e.U.
specializes: OwnCube - open source cloud hosting since 2012. Nextcloud Single and Admin, own apps, design, users, ... More than 30 data center locations worldwide.

title: Kinamo SA
specializes: Kinamo offers cloud storage solutions based on NextCloud, both on a per user base as well as a cloud server instances with business support.

title: LineONE
specializes: Discover an enterprise-ready and innovative way to access and share your files, calendars, contacts and mail. Hosted in Germany.

title: Tech and Me
specializes: Swedish-hosted virtual machine images with Nextcloud pre-installed and various service options available for secure and easy file sync and share!

title: Service Metric
specializes: Service Metric offers per user cloud storage to enterprise solutions powered by Nextcloud on fully managed high availability infrastructure in the US.
